CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: EM-rail(AP/EMP)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Electromagnetic rail-launched armor-piercing round, capable of both hard and soft kill. Penetrates heavy armor and releases EMP to disable electronics.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: EM-rail(Ion)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Electromagnetic rail-launched ion round, disrupts target integrity and electronics through ionization, highly effective against shields.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: EM-rail(standard)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Standard Electromagnetic rail-launched round, able to penetrate heavy armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: homing-AP/EMP
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Homing armor-piercing round with trajectory adjustment capability for precision hits, combined with EMP effect for dual damage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: homing
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Standard homing ammunition, locks onto and tracks targets via built-in sensors, ideal for engaging high-speed moving units.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: hypersonic
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Hypersonic homing projectile, penetrates enemy defenses with extreme velocity, causing massive damage via kinetic energy.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: hypersonic(inverse entropy)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Hypersonic homing projectile utilizing inverse entropy technology, self-adjusts in flight to counter precision loss from entropy, achieving near-perfect hit rate.
